argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | metcnp4.3 | |- J = ( MetOpen ` C ) |
| 2 |  | metcnp4.4 | |- K = ( MetOpen ` D ) |
| 3 |  | metcnp4.5 | |- ( ph -> C e. ( *Met ` X ) ) |
| 4 |  | metcnp4.6 | |- ( ph -> D e. ( *Met ` Y ) ) |
| 5 |  | metcn4.7 | |- ( ph -> F : X --> Y ) |
| 6 | 1 | #P_met1stc | |- ( C e. ( *Met ` X ) -> J e. 1stc ) |
| 7 | 3, 6 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> J e. 1stc ) |
| 8 | 1 | #P_mopntopon | |- ( C e. ( *Met ` X ) -> J e. ( TopOn ` X ) ) |
| 9 | 3, 8 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> J e. ( TopOn ` X ) ) |
| 10 | 2 | #P_mopntopon | |- ( D e. ( *Met ` Y ) -> K e. ( TopOn ` Y ) ) |
| 11 | 4, 10 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> K e. ( TopOn ` Y ) ) |
| 12 | 7, 9, 11, 5 | #P_1stccn | |- ( ph -> ( F e. ( J Cn K ) <-> A. f ( f : NN --> X -> A. x ( f ( ~~>t ` J ) x -> ( F o. f ) ( ~~>t ` K ) ( F ` x ) ) ) ) ) |
